what_you_do: Toni Lontis is a Lifestyle Entrepreneur, Author, Speaker, Blogger and International Tour Host.
who_you_serve: She has dedicated her life's work to helping women and the men who love them, find their passion, purpose and voice.
signature_programs: Her book 'Resilience – Memoir of a Broken Little Girl'
business_focus: Helping women and men find their passion, purpose and voice.
service_provided: writing, speaking, mentoring, radio show, podcasts
